Digit ArtWork

I think NFT is a great way to prove the digit artwork’s information. So some of my digit artwork will be stored in NFT format. Here’s my:

0xMonkey

@jaxonly.bit and @0xMonkey,this is a very interesting project which in my opinion is just copying project Monkey Kingdom, but it is something fun here. You can generate the 0xMonkey by this opensource website:开源头像拼图
